overview: A marginalized people rose up from humble beginnings, with nothing but their talent, their guiding principles, and their determination to leave none behind. The public has heard so many sad stories, but Atautsikut / Leaving None Behind reveals another aspect of the true North. In their own words, raw and unfiltered, the Nunavik Inuit and Cree recount their struggle and how their co-ops came shining through â€“ a message of hope.

production_companies.name: The Grise Fiord Picture Company Inc.

title: Atautsikut / Leaving None Behind
